mod.name: 100% Spire Juice
mod.credits:
Art Assets - Orange_Juice and Fruitbat Factory
BaseMod, ModTheSpire, and StSLib - Bug Kiooeht
StSDefaultModBase - Gremious
Beta Testing - Spookalon, Skyson, Fenec250, reina
Character Animation Assistance - Darkglade
Misc. Coding Assistance - Gk, Jobby, Kio, Darkglade, Jedi, Alchyr, Vex, Teafling, and many more from #modding-technical in general
Simplified Chinese Translation - Anonymous User
Korean Translation - Tsurumaki Maki
mod.description:
Adds Star Breaker from 100% Orange Juice. 

Including 80+ cards and 0% original art!

cards.name: Ambush
cards.description:
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Then deal 5 damage.
Norma 3: This Attack will moonworks:Pierce.

cards.name: Ambush+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Then deal 7 damage.
Norma 3: This Attack will moonworks:Pierce.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Norma 1: +1 Block.
Norma 3: +1 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Norma 1: +1 Block.
Norma 3: +1 Block.

cards.name: Long-Distance Shot
cards.description:
Deal 3 moonworks:Piercing Damage.
Draw this card whenever you generate a Norma level.
Norma 3: Draw 1 card if this effect has uses. Uses: 2.

cards.name: Long-Distance Shot+
cards.description:
Deal 5 moonworks:Piercing Damage.
Draw this card whenever you generate a Norma level.
Norma 3: Draw 1 card if this effect has uses. Uses: 3.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Norma 2: +1 damage.
Norma 4: +2 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Norma 2: +1 damage.
Norma 4: +2 damage.

cards.name: Air Strike
cards.description:
Deal 20 moonworks:Splash Damage to ALL enemies.
Purge.

cards.name: Air Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 30 moonworks:Splash Damage to ALL enemies.
Purge.

cards.name: Big Rocket Cannon
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
Shuffle 1 Air Strike into your draw pile.
Purge.

cards.name: Big Rocket Cannon+
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage to ALL enemies.
Shuffle 1 Air [diffAddS] Strike+ [diffAddE] into your draw pile.
Purge.

cards.name: Evil Spy Work Execution
cards.description:
Autoplay.
Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.
Draw 1 card.
Purge.

cards.name: Evil Spy Work Execution+
cards.description:
Autoplay.
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.
Draw 1 card.
Purge.

cards.name: Lulu's Luckiest Egg
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block 2 times.
Draw 2 cards.
Gain 2 temporary Dexterity.

cards.name: Lulu's Luckiest Egg+
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block 3 times.
Draw 3 cards.
Gain 3 temporary Dexterity.

cards.name: Magical Inferno
cards.description:
Deal 5 moonworks:Splash Damage to ALL enemies.
Gain 5 Vigor.
Exhaustive 0.

cards.name: Magical Inferno+
cards.description:
Deal 7 moonworks:Splash Damage to ALL enemies.
Gain 7 Vigor.
Exhaustive 0.

cards.name: Magical Massacre
cards.description:
The healthiest enemy loses 8 HP and max HP.
Gain 5 moonworks:Steady.
Exhaustive 0.

cards.name: Magical Massacre+
cards.description:
The healthiest enemy loses 12 HP and max HP.
Gain 7 moonworks:Steady.
Exhaustive 0.

cards.name: Magical Revenge
cards.description:
Deal 25 % of your missing HP as moonworks:Revenge Damage with 33 % moonworks:Life_Steal.
(Deals 0 damage.)
Exhaustive 0.

cards.name: Magical Revenge+
cards.description:
Deal 33 % of your missing HP as moonworks:Revenge Damage with 50 % moonworks:Life_Steal.
(Deals 0 damage.)
Exhaustive 0.

cards.name: Star Blasting Light
cards.description:
Apply 3 to 5 moonworks:Blasting_Light to ALL enemies.
Purge.
Norma X: +X moonworks:Blasting_Light.

cards.name: Star Blasting Light+
cards.description:
Apply 4 to 7 moonworks:Blasting_Light to ALL enemies.
Purge.
Norma X: +X moonworks:Blasting_Light.

cards.name: Truly Golden Egg
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Add 1 of 3 random Attack cards to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Truly Golden Egg+
cards.description:
Gain 14 Block.
Add 1 of 3 random Attack cards to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Assault
cards.description:
Deal 7 moonworks:Piercing Damage.
Norma 2: The Pierce effect will be twice as strong.

cards.name: Assault+
cards.description:
Deal 9 moonworks:Piercing Damage.
Norma 2: The Pierce effect will be twice as strong.

cards.name: Beast Witch
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Gain 2 temporary Strength.
Norma 2: +2 damage.

cards.name: Beast Witch+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Gain 3 temporary Strength.
Norma 2: +2 damage.

cards.name: Blue Crow
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Gain 2 Block.
Gains +2 Block for each Attack in your hand.

cards.name: Blue Crow the Second
cards.description:
[diffAddS] Retain.
[diffAddE] Deal 6 damage.
Gain 2 Block.
Gains +2 Block for each Attack in your hand.

cards.name: Cloud of Seagulls
cards.description:
Deal 2 moonworks:Fixed Damage to a random target 2 times.
Add 1 Jonathan Rush to your hand.
Norma 2: Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Cloud of Seagulls+
cards.description:
Deal 2 moonworks:Fixed Damage to a random [diffAddS] enemy [diffAddE] 3 times.
Add 1 Jonathan [diffAddS] Rush+ [diffAddE] to your hand. 
Norma 2: Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Completion Reward
cards.description:
Deals damage for every card played this combat.
(Deals 0 damage.)
Norma 2: +6 damage.

cards.name: Completion Reward+
cards.description:
Deals damage for every card played this combat.
(Deals 0 damage.)
Norma 2: +6 damage.

cards.name: Delta Field
cards.description: ALL enemies gain 1 Vulnerable and lose 1 temporary Strength.

cards.name: Delta Field+
cards.description: ALL enemies gain 1 Vulnerable and lose 2 temporary Strength.

cards.name: Deploy Bits
cards.description:
Gain a total of 10 randomly distributed Block and Vigor.
Norma 4: Bit distribution is now moonworks:Optimized.

cards.name: Deploy Bits+
cards.description:
Gain a total of 14 randomly distributed Block and Vigor.
Norma 4: Bit distribution is now moonworks:Optimized.

cards.name: Desperate Modification
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
If the enemy intends to attack you, gain 12 Block and Exhaust instead.

cards.name: Desperate Modification+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
If the enemy intends to attack you, gain 16 Block and Exhaust instead.

cards.name: Evil Spy Work Preparation
cards.description: Shuffle 3 Evil Spy Work Execution into your draw pile.

cards.name: Evil Spy Work Preparation+
cards.description: Shuffle 4 Evil Spy Work Execution into your draw pile.

cards.name: Extraordinary Specs
cards.description:
Gain 4 temporary Strength and Dexterity.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Extraordinary Specs+
cards.description:
Gain 4 temporary Strength and Dexterity.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Golden Egg
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Shuffle a random Attack into your draw pile.
Norma 2: Add the card to your hand instead.

cards.name: Golden Egg+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Shuffle a random Attack into your draw pile.
Norma 2: Add the card to your hand instead.

cards.name: I'm On Fire!
cards.description:
Gain 10 Vigor and 1 Vulnerable.
Norma 4: -10 Vigor, gain double damage this turn.

cards.name: I'm On Fire!+
cards.description:
Gain 14 Vigor and 1 Vulnerable.
Norma 4: -10 Vigor, gain double damage this turn.

cards.name: Indiscriminate Fire
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage to ALL enemies X times.
Shuffle 2 Dazed into your draw pile.
Norma 2: Shuffle 1 less Dazed into your draw pile.

cards.name: Indiscriminate Fire+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies X times.
Shuffle 2 Dazed into your draw pile.
Norma 2: Shuffle 1 less Dazed into your draw pile.

cards.name: Jonathan Rush
cards.description:
Autoplay.
Deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
Increase the damage of ALL Jonathan Rush cards this combat by 2.

cards.name: Jonathan Rush+
cards.description:
Autoplay.
Deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
Increase the damage of ALL Jonathan Rush cards this combat by 3.

cards.name: Lulu's Lucky Egg
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Trigger 1 of 3 effects:
Draw 2 cards.
Gain Block 2 times instead.
Gain 2 temporary Dexterity.

cards.name: Lulu's Lucky Egg+
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Trigger 1 of 3 effects:
Draw 3 cards.
Gain Block 3 times instead.
Gain 3 temporary Dexterity.

cards.name: Nice Present
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.
Norma 2: Drawn cards will Retain this turn.

cards.name: Nice Present+
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
Exhaust.
Norma 2: Drawn cards will Retain this turn.

cards.name: Quick Restoration
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block 2 times.
Norma 3: -1 Block, but gain Block +1 time.

cards.name: Quick Restoration+
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block 2 times.
Norma 3: -1 Block, but gain Block +1 time.

cards.name: Rainbow-Colored Circle
cards.description:
Convert 6 Block into moonworks:Steady.
Norma 2: +4 Block Conversion and Optimize.

cards.name: Rainbow-Colored Circle+
cards.description:
Convert 6 Block into moonworks:Steady.
Norma 2: +4 Block Conversion and Optimize.

cards.name: Rbits
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block.
Gain 2 moonworks:Steady.

cards.name: Rbits+
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Gain 3 moonworks:Steady.

cards.name: Saki's Cookie
cards.description:
Heal 2 HP.
Exhaust.
Norma 4: Also draw 1 card.

cards.name: Saki's Cookie+
cards.description:
Heal 3 HP.
Exhaust.
Norma 4: Also draw 1 card.

cards.name: Unforgiving Avenger
cards.description:
Deal 12 moonworks:Revenge Damage.
Apply 1 Weak.
Norma 2: +2 damage.

cards.name: Unforgiving Avenger+
cards.description:
Deal 14 moonworks:Revenge Damage.
Apply 2 Weak.
Norma 2: +2 damage.

cards.name: White Christsmasher
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage twice.
If you are holding Red & Blue, this instead hits ALL enemies.

cards.name: White Christsmasher+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage twice.
If you are holding Red & Blue, this instead hits ALL enemies.

cards.name: Angel Hand
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain 10 Block.
On retain, this card changes into Devil Hand.

cards.name: Angel Hand+
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain 14 Block.
On retain, this card changes into Devil Hand.

cards.name: Awakening Of Talent
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Gain 7 Block.
Draw 1 card.
If this kills an enemy, gain [E].
Norma 4: Gain [E].

cards.name: Awakening Of Talent+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Gain 10 Block.
Draw 1 card.
If this kills an enemy, gain [E].
Norma 4: Gain [E].

cards.name: Backdoor Trade
cards.description:
Gain 1 moonworks:Norma.
Exhaust.
Norma 5: Don't exhaust, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Backdoor Trade+
cards.description:
Gain 1 moonworks:Norma.
Exhaust.
Norma 5: Don't exhaust, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Beyond Hell
cards.description:
Gain 2 Vigor for every 5 missing HP.
Exhaust.
Norma 5: Gain Vigor for every 3 missing HP instead.

cards.name: Beyond Hell+
cards.description:
Gain 3 Vigor for every 5 missing HP.
Exhaust.
Norma 5: Gain Vigor for every 3 missing HP instead.

cards.name: Big Bang Bell
cards.description:
Apply 10 Big Bang Bell.
Draw this card whenever you generate a Norma level.
Exhaust.
Norma 3: +5 base amount.

cards.name: Big Bang Bell+
cards.description:
Apply 15 Big Bang Bell.
Draw this card whenever you generate a Norma level.
Exhaust.
Norma 3: +5 base amount.

cards.name: Big Magnum
cards.description:
Exhaust 1 card.
Gain 4 Vigor.
Increase this card's Vigor gain by 4 this combat.
Can be upgraded 5 times.

cards.name: Bigger Magnum
cards.description:
Exhaust 1 card.
Gain 4 Vigor.
Increase this card's Vigor gain by 6 this combat.
Can be upgraded 5 times.

cards.name: Biggest Magnum
cards.description:
Exhaust 1 card.
Gain 4 Vigor.
Increase this card's Vigor gain by 9 this combat.
Can be upgraded 5 times.

cards.name: Biggester Magnum
cards.description:
Exhaust 1 card.
Gain 4 Vigor.
Increase this card's Vigor gain by 13 this combat.
Can be upgraded 5 times.

cards.name: Biggestest Magnum
cards.description:
Exhaust 1 card.
Gain 4 Vigor.
Increase this card's Vigor gain by 18 this combat.
Can be upgraded 5 times.

cards.name: Biggestestest Magnum
cards.description:
Exhaust 1 card.
Gain 4 Vigor.
Increase this card's Vigor gain by 24 this combat.
Can be upgraded 5 times.

cards.name: Binding Chains
cards.description:
Target loses 6 Strength this turn and gains 1 Vulnerable. moonworks:Splash.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Binding Chains+
cards.description:
Target loses 8 Strength this turn and gains 2 Vulnerable. moonworks:Splash.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bloodlust
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 4.
In Hand: Upon attacking, gain 2 temporary Strength for ALL attacks you make this turn.

cards.name: Bloodlust+
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 4.
In Hand: Upon attacking, gain 3 temporary Strength for ALL attacks you make this turn.

cards.name: Cast Off
cards.description:
Lose all Block.
Gain Vigor equal to the amount of Block lost.
Exhaust.
Norma 2: Gain 5 moonworks:Steady.

cards.name: Cast Off+
cards.description:
Lose all Block.
Gain Vigor equal to the amount of Block lost.
Exhaust.
Norma 2: Gain 5 moonworks:Steady.

cards.name: Cooking Time
cards.description:
Everyone heals 3 HP. Deals damage equal to the amount healed.
Exhaust.
Norma 3: +3 HP healed.

cards.name: Cooking Time+
cards.description:
Everyone heals 5 HP. Deals damage equal to the amount healed.
Exhaust.
Norma 3: +3 HP healed.

cards.name: Dash!
cards.description:
Gain [E].
Exhaust.
Norma 2: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Dash!+
cards.description:
Gain [diffAddS] [E] [diffAddE] [E].
Exhaust. 
Norma 2: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Devil Hand
cards.description:
Retain.
Deal 10 damage.
On retain, this card changes into Angel Hand.

cards.name: Devil Hand+
cards.description:
Retain.
Deal 14 damage.
On retain, this card changes into Angel Hand.

cards.name: Dinner
cards.description:
Apply 3 Regen to ALL targets.
Exhaust.
Norma 2: Gain Block equal to the amount of Regen applied.

cards.name: Dinner+
cards.description:
Apply 4 Regen to ALL targets.
Exhaust.
Norma 2: Gain Block equal to the amount of Regen applied.

cards.name: Extended Photon Rifle
cards.description:
Deal 0 damage X times.
Strength is 3 times more effective for this card.

cards.name: Extended Photon Rifle+
cards.description:
Deal 0 damage X times.
Strength is 4 times more effective for this card.

cards.name: Final Battle
cards.description: For the next 10 turns, everyone's attacks deal double damage.

cards.name: Final Battle+
cards.description: For the next 10 turns, everyone's attacks deal double damage.

cards.name: Final Surgery
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
If the enemy has Vulnerable or moonworks:Overheat, deal 12 damage again.

cards.name: Final Surgery+
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage.
If the enemy has Vulnerable or moonworks:Overheat, deal 16 damage again.

cards.name: Flamethrower
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 12.
In Hand: Upon playing a card, deal 2 moonworks:Fixed Damage to an enemy.

cards.name: Flamethrower+
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 12.
In Hand: Upon playing a card, deal 3 moonworks:Fixed Damage to an enemy.

cards.name: Forced Revival
cards.description:
Heal 4 HP.
Gain [E].
Gain 2 Weak.
Exhaust.
Norma 3: -1 Weak.

cards.name: Forced Revival+
cards.description:
Heal 6 HP.
Gain [diffAddS] [E] [diffAddE] [E].
Gain 2 Weak.
Exhaust. 
Norma 3: -1 Weak.

cards.name: Full Speed Alicianrone
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Next turn, draw 2 additional cards.
Norma 3: Deal damage to ALL enemies instead.

cards.name: Full Speed Alicianrone+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Next turn, draw 2 additional cards.
Norma 3: Deal damage to ALL enemies instead.

cards.name: Heat 300%
cards.description:
Apply 2 moonworks:Overheat.
Exhaust.
Norma 2: Overheat will apply a 50% bonus instead.

cards.name: Heat 300%+
cards.description:
Apply 3 moonworks:Overheat.
Exhaust.
Norma 2: Overheat will apply a 50% bonus instead.

cards.name: Holy Night
cards.description:
Once per turn, you may spend [E] to draw 2 cards.
Norma 3: Uses per turn becomes unlimited.

cards.name: Holy Night+
cards.description:
[diffAddS] Innate.
[diffAddE] Once per turn, you may spend [E] to draw 2 cards. 
Norma 3: Uses per turn becomes unlimited.

cards.name: Immovable Object
cards.description:
Gain 30 Block.
Gain 2 moonworks:Immobile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Immovable Object+
cards.description:
Gain 40 Block.
Gain 2 moonworks:Immobile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Intelligence Officer
cards.description:
Scry 3 then For Each...
Attack: Gain 3 Vigor.
Skill: Gain 3 moonworks:Steady.
Other: Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Intelligence Officer+
cards.description:
Scry 5 then For Each...
Attack: Gain 3 Vigor.
Skill: Gain 3 moonworks:Steady.
Other: Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Lucky Charm
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 3.
In Hand: Gain [E] at the beginning of your turn.
On Play: Discard and use up to 3 [E] to regain moonworks:Gift_Uses.

cards.name: Lucky Charm+
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 4.
In Hand: Gain [E] at the beginning of your turn.
On Play: Discard and use up to 3 [E] to regain moonworks:Gift_Uses.

cards.name: Miracle Walker
cards.description:
moonworks:Transformative
Each time this card transforms, it costs 0 that turn.
Norma 5: Transformed Attack and Skill cards will not exhaust.

cards.name: Miracle Walker+
cards.description:
moonworks:Transformative
Each time this card transforms, it costs 0 that turn. [diffAddS]
Transformed cards will be upgraded. [diffAddE] 
Norma 5: Transformed Attack and Skill cards will not exhaust.

cards.name: Mix Phenomenon
cards.description:
Restore the moonworks:Gift_Uses of 1 random gift card and shuffle it into your draw pile.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mix Phenomenon+
cards.description:
Restore the moonworks:Gift_Uses of 1 [diffRmvS] random [diffRmvE] gift card and shuffle it into your draw pile.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Out Of Ammo
cards.description: Whenever you have either no cards, or only moonworks:Gift and Unplayable Status cards, in your hand during your turn, draw a card.

cards.name: Out Of Ammo+
cards.description: Whenever you have either no cards, or only moonworks:Gift and Unplayable Status cards, in your hand during your turn, draw a card.

cards.name: Poppo The Snatcher
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 3.
In Hand: If an enemy attempts to buff, the buff is applied to you instead.

cards.name: Poppo The Snatcher+
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 4.
In Hand: If an enemy attempts to buff, the buff is applied to you instead.

cards.name: Poppoformation
cards.description: The next 2 times each enemy makes an intent, apply Weak, Frail, or Vulnerable based on the intent.

cards.name: Poppoformation+
cards.description: The next 3 times each enemy makes an intent, apply Weak, Frail, or Vulnerable based on the intent.

cards.name: Present For You
cards.description:
Choose 1 effect:
Shuffle 1 moonworks:Gift card into your draw pile.
Shuffle 1 moonworks:Trap card into your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Present For You+
cards.description:
Choose 1 effect:
Shuffle 2 moonworks:Gift [diffAddS] cards [diffAddE] into your draw pile.
Shuffle 2 moonworks:Trap [diffAddS] cards [diffAddE] into your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Protagonist's Privilege
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage.
Draw 2 cards.
If both cards drawn are the same type, repeat this effect next turn.
Norma 2: Heal 3 HP if unblocked damage was dealt.

cards.name: Protagonist's Privilege+
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
Draw 2 cards.
If both cards drawn are the same type, repeat this effect next turn.
Norma 2: Heal 3 HP if unblocked damage was dealt.

cards.name: Raging Madness
cards.description:
Whenever you receive unblocked damage, gain 2 Strength.
Norma 3: Gain twice the Strength.

cards.name: Raging Madness+
cards.description:
[diffAddS] Innate.
[diffAddE] Whenever you receive unblocked damage, gain 2 Strength. 
Norma 3: Gain twice the Strength.

cards.name: Red & Blue
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 3.
In Hand: Gain 4 Vigor and 4 moonworks:Steady at the beginning of your turn.

cards.name: Red & Blue+
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 3.
In Hand: Gain 6 Vigor and 6 moonworks:Steady at the beginning of your turn.

cards.name: Red Bean Ice Cream
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 2.
In Hand: Gain 2 temporary Strength.
On Play: Exhaust.
On Exhaust: Heal 5 HP.

cards.name: Red Bean Ice Cream+
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 3.
In Hand: Gain 2 temporary Strength.
On Play: Exhaust.
On Exhaust: Heal 5 HP.

cards.name: Reproduction of Records
cards.description:
Add a copy of the 3 most recent cards in your discard pile to your hand.
Exhaust.
Norma 4: Gain [E].

cards.name: Reproduction of Records+
cards.description:
[diffAddS] Retain.
[diffAddE] Add a copy of the 3 most recent cards in your discard pile to your hand.
Exhaust. 
Norma 4: Gain [E].

cards.name: Scrambled Eve
cards.description:
Discard any number of cards, then draw that many plus 0.
Norma 1: Draw +1 card.
Norma 3: Draw +1 card

cards.name: Scrambled Eve+
cards.description:
[diffAddS] Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.
[diffAddE] Discard any number of cards, then draw that many plus 0. 
Norma 1: Draw +1 card.
Norma 3: Draw +1 card

cards.name: Sealed Memories
cards.description:
*Convert up to 1 card in your hand into a moonworks:Memory.
Retain your hand this turn.

cards.name: Sealed Memories+
cards.description:
[diffAddS] Retain.
[diffAddE] Convert up to 1 card in your hand into a moonworks:Memory.
Retain your hand this turn.

Gain 1 moonworks:Crystallize.
Gain 1 Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Stiff Crystal+
cards.description:

Gain 7 Block.
Exhaust.
Norma 1: +4 Block.

cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 3.

cards.name: Sweet Battle+

moonworks:Gift_Uses 4.

Gain 10 Block.
Next turn, gain [E] and 6 Block.
Norma 2: +2 Block both turns.

cards.name: Tactical Retreat+
cards.description:
Gain 13 Block.
Next turn, gain [E] and 8 Block.
Norma 2: +2 Block both turns.

cards.name: Treasure Thief
cards.description:
Once per turn, when you damage this target, draw 1 card.
Exhaust.
Norma 3: Effect works twice per turn instead.

cards.name: Treasure Thief+
cards.description:
Once per turn, when you damage this target, draw 1 card.
Exhaust.
Norma 3: Effect works twice per turn instead.

cards.name: Unlucky Charm
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 3.
In Hand: Any debuffs applied to you are applied to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Unlucky Charm+
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 4.
In Hand: Any debuffs applied to you are applied to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Unpaid Work
cards.description:
The next card you play which does not purge and costs more than 0 will refund it's cost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Unpaid Work+
cards.description:
The next card you play which does not purge and costs more than 0 will refund it's cost.
Exhaust.

cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 3.
On Draw: Draw 2 cards.
On Retain: Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Windy Enchantment+
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 4.
On Draw: Draw 2 cards.
On Retain: Draw 1 card.

cards.name: x1 Big Rocket
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage. Increase this card's damage by 6 this combat.
Can be Upgraded to x16.

cards.name: x10 Big Rocket
cards.description:
Deal 39 damage. Increase this card's damage by 33 this combat.
Can be Upgraded to x16.

cards.name: x2 Big Rocket
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage. Increase this card's damage by 9 this combat.
Can be Upgraded to x16.

cards.name: x3 Big Rocket
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage. Increase this card's damage by 12 this combat.
Can be Upgraded to x16.

cards.name: x4 Big Rocket
cards.description:
Deal 21 damage. Increase this card's damage by 15 this combat.
Can be Upgraded to x16.

cards.name: x5 Big Rocket
cards.description:
Deal 24 damage. Increase this card's damage by 18 this combat.
Can be Upgraded to x16.

cards.name: x6 Big Rocket
cards.description:
Deal 27 damage. Increase this card's damage by 21 this combat.
Can be Upgraded to x16.

cards.name: x7 Big Rocket
cards.description:
Deal 30 damage. Increase this card's damage by 24 this combat.
Can be Upgraded to x16.

cards.name: x8 Big Rocket
cards.description:
Deal 33 damage. Increase this card's damage by 27 this combat.
Can be Upgraded to x16.

cards.name: x9 Big Rocket
cards.description:
Deal 36 damage. Increase this card's damage by 30 this combat.
Can be Upgraded to x16.

cards.name: Accel Hyper
cards.description:
This turn, your next Attack and Skill are played twice.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Accel Hyper+
cards.description:
This turn, your next Attack and Skill are played twice. [diffRmvS]
Exhaust. [diffRmvE]

cards.name: Accelerator
cards.description:
Gain 1 Accelerator.
Norma 5: Optional: Spend [E] to also Upgrade all newly created cards.

cards.name: Accelerator+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Accelerator.
Norma 5: Optional: Spend [E] to also Upgrade all newly created cards.

cards.name: Another Ultimate Weapon
cards.description:
Gain X Strength and 5X Block.
Norma X: +X Strength and +5X Block.

cards.name: Another Ultimate Weapon+
cards.description:
Gain [diffAddS] X+1 [diffAddE] Strength and [diffAddS] 5(X+1) [diffAddE] Block. 
Norma X: +X Strength and +5X Block.

cards.name: Blazing!
cards.description: At the start of your turn, apply 6 moonworks:Blasting_Light to ALL enemies and increase this amount by 3.

cards.name: Blazing!+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, apply 6 moonworks:Blasting_Light to ALL enemies and increase this amount by 6.

cards.name: Chef, Please Help Me!
cards.description:
Deal 10 moonworks:Revenge Damage.
Deals double damage every 3 times HP is lost this combat.

cards.name: Chef, Please Help Me!+
cards.description:
Deal 14 moonworks:Revenge Damage.
Deals double damage every 3 times HP is lost this combat.

cards.name: Crystal Barrier
cards.description:
Block is not removed at the start of your turn.
Gain 4 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Crystal Barrier+
cards.description:
Block is not removed at the start of your turn.
Gain 6 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Dark Side of Business
cards.description:
Lose all Norma.
Choose 1 of 3 moonworks:Magical cards with charges equal to the amount of Norma lost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dark Side of Business+
cards.description:
Lose all Norma.
Choose 1 of 3 [diffAddS] upgraded [diffAddE] moonworks:Magical cards with charges equal to the amount of Norma lost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Encore
cards.description: The last card you play each turn has it's effect repeated at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Encore+
cards.description: The last card you play each turn has it's effect repeated at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Evil Mastermind
cards.description:
Trigger the effect of ALL your Trap cards on random enemies, excluding other Evil Masterminds.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Evil Mastermind+
cards.description:
[diffAddS] Innate.
[diffAddE] Trigger the effect of ALL your Trap cards on random enemies, excluding other Evil Masterminds. 
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gamble!
cards.description: A random target dies.

cards.name: Gamble!+
cards.description:
[diffAddS] Retain.
[diffAddE] A random target dies.

cards.name: Go Away
cards.description:
Ethereal.
The target is moonworks:Stunned for a turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Go Away+
cards.description:
[diffRmvS] Ethereal.
[diffRmvE] The target is moonworks:Stunned for a turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Leap Through Spacetime
cards.description:
Choose one effect:
You can borrow Energy from your next turn.
You can borrow Cards from your next turn.

cards.name: Leap Through Spacetime+
cards.description:
Choose one effect:
You can borrow Energy from your next turn.
You can borrow Cards from your next turn.

cards.name: Melting Memories
cards.description:
Lose all Norma.
The first card you play each turn is Converted into a moonworks:Memory.
Regain 1 lost Norma per turn.

cards.name: Melting Memories+
cards.description:
Lose all Norma.
The first card you play each turn is Converted into a [diffAddS] moonworks:Memory then upgraded. [diffAddE]
Regain 1 lost Norma per turn.

cards.name: Metallic Monocoque
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 3.
In Hand: Whenever you would lose HP, lose 5 less for all attacks in that turn.

cards.name: Metallic Monocoque+
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 4.
In Hand: Whenever you would lose HP, lose 6 less for all attacks in that turn.

cards.name: Plushie Master
cards.description:
Apply 4 moonworks:Plushie_Marks to random enemies.
Norma 2: +2 Marks.

cards.name: Plushie Master+
cards.description:
Apply 6 moonworks:Plushie_Marks to random enemies.
Norma 2: +2 Marks.

cards.name: Reflective Shell
cards.description: Prevent the next time you would lose HP. Gain Vigor equal to the damage you would have taken.

cards.name: Reflective Shell+
cards.description: Prevent the next time you would lose HP. Gain Vigor equal to the damage you would have taken.

cards.name: Rival
cards.description: The healthiest enemy becomes your moonworks:Rival.

cards.name: Rival+
cards.description: The healthiest enemy becomes your moonworks:Rival.

cards.name: Rocket Cannon
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Shuffle 1 Big Rocket Cannon into your draw pile.
Norma 2: Shuffle an additional card.

cards.name: Rocket Cannon+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Shuffle 1 Big Rocket [diffAddS] Cannon+ [diffAddE] into your draw pile. 
Norma 2: Shuffle an additional card.

cards.name: Shield Counter
cards.description:
Gain 15 Block.
Gain 1 moonworks:Shield_Counter.
Exhaust.
Norma 3: moonworks:Shield_Counter will rollover.

cards.name: Shield Counter+
cards.description:
Gain 20 Block.
Gain 1 moonworks:Shield_Counter.
Exhaust.
Norma 3: moonworks:Shield_Counter will rollover.

cards.name: Sink Or Swim
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E] at the start of every turn.
Gain 3 Weak and Frail.

cards.name: Sink Or Swim+
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E] at the start of every turn.
Gain 3 Weak and Frail.

cards.name: Star Blasting Fuse
cards.description:
Apply moonworks:Invisible_Bomb.
Shuffle this card into your draw pile.
When you draw this card, ALL enemies with moonworks:Invisible_Bomb lose 30 HP.

cards.name: Star Blasting Fuse+
cards.description:
Apply moonworks:Invisible_Bomb.
Shuffle this card into your draw pile.
When you draw this card, ALL enemies with moonworks:Invisible_Bomb lose 40 HP.

cards.name: Subspace Tunnel
cards.description:
Choose a card in any pile.
Move that card to your hand and put this card where it was.
The card this swaps with costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Subspace Tunnel+
cards.description:
Choose a card in any pile.
Move that card to your hand and put this card where it was.
The card this swaps with costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Wanted
cards.description:
Apply 1 moonworks:Wanted.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wanted+
cards.description:
[diffAddS] Retain.
[diffAddE] Apply 1 moonworks:Wanted.
Exhaust.

cards.name: We Are Waruda
cards.description:
Remove all debuffs from ALL targets.
Apply all removed debuffs to one target.
Exhaust.

cards.name: We Are Waruda+
cards.description:
Remove all debuffs from ALL targets.
Apply all removed debuffs to one target.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Whimsical Windmill
cards.description: At the beginning of your turn, gain energy for each enemy who attacked you last turn.

cards.name: Whimsical Windmill+
cards.description:
[diffAddS] Innate.
[diffAddE] At the beginning of your turn, gain energy for each enemy who attacked you last turn.

relics.name: Broken Bomb
relics.description:
Add 1 Star Blasting Light to your hand each time you generate moonworks:Norma.
Note: By default, every 10th Skill you play raises your Norma by 1.

relics.name: Homemark
relics.description: Start every combat with Norma 0. Right click when out of combat to spend 120 Gold to permanently raise this effect, up to a maximum of 5.
relics.flavorText: It tastes like orange juice. Strange.

relics.name: Bonus Panel
relics.description: Whenever you generate moonworks:Norma, gain 1 energy.
relics.flavorText: Tiny, but stars are stars. Part 3 of a series, can you collect them all?

relics.name: Heal Panel
relics.description: Whenever you generate moonworks:Norma, heal 2 HP.
relics.flavorText: Recommended by 0 out of 1 doctors wearing lab coats. Part 1 of a series, can you collect them all?

relics.name: Home Panel
relics.description: moonworks:Norma levels require 2 less cards to achieve.
relics.flavorText: If you get homesick, just step on it. Part 2 of a series, can you collect them all?

relics.name: A Truly Golden Egg
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain a unique version of Lulu's Lucky Egg and Golden Egg that have stronger effects.

relics.name: Bottled Orange
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. Whenever you generate moonworks:Norma, move this card to your hand.

relics.name: Damage Panel
relics.description: Whenever you generate moonworks:Norma, deal 7 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: "Ouch! What did I just step on?" Part 4 of a series, can you collect them all?

relics.name: Draw Panel
relics.description: Whenever you generate moonworks:Norma, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Imagine only being able to hold 3 cards in your hand... Part 5 of a series, can you collect them all?

relics.name: Fleeting Butterfly
relics.description: The first card you play each combat is converted into a moonworks:Memory.
relics.flavorText: Take a picture, it'll last longer.

relics.name: Little Gull
relics.description: At the beginning of your turn, and every time you play a Jonathan Rush or Cloud of Seagulls, deal 2 to 7 damage to a random enemy.

relics.name: Scorching Sun
relics.description: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 moonworks:Blasting_Light.

relics.name: Searchlight
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 2 moonworks:Overheat to the healthiest enemy.

relics.name: Spare Bit
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain 2 Deploy Bits. All Deploy Bits now increase bits by 2 when played each combat.
relics.flavorText: Not to be confused with a Sign Bit.

relics.name: Strange Present
relics.description: At the end of turn 5, apply 4 Vulnerable and Weak to ALL enemies.

relics.name: SB Bomb
relics.description:
Add 1 Star Blasting Light to your hand each time you generate moonworks:Norma.
Every 12th card you play raises your Norma by 1 instead.

relics.name: Golden Die
relics.description: Increase the Uses of your positive Gift cards by 50%.
relics.flavorText: Sadly, unable to roll zeros or sevens.

potions.name: Norma Potion
potions.description: Generate 1 Norma for the next 3 turns.

potions.name: Refund Potion
potions.description: The next 2 cards you play have their cost refunded.

potions.name: 200% Orange Juice
potions.description: Achieve Norma 6. Receive incredible power that you cannot safely contain.

keywords.name: Auto Consume
keywords.description: The card's effect is automatically activated and the card is immediately purged. This does not count as playing the card.

keywords.name: Auto Effect
keywords.description: This effect is automatically activated and does not count as playing the card.

keywords.name: Blast Off!
keywords.description: Increases by the amount of damage received. At the start of your next turn, the target loses Blastoff and takes damage equal to it's amount

keywords.name: Blasting Light
keywords.description: Blasted creatures lose both HP and Max HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, the blast worsens, but the worse the blast is the more likely it is to wear off.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Crystallize
keywords.description: Negates a debuff. Block is retained for a turn when a debuff is negated.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Degraded
keywords.description: This card's base damage and block values are reduced by up to 3 each time it is drawn. The base values will not reduce lower than 1.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Divergence
keywords.description:
Divergence from the main timeline results in things not going back exactly the way you remembered them.
Attempting to Leap with high Divergence may result in permanent unwanted effects.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Fixed
keywords.description: This card is affected by Plushie Mark and Buffer, but unaffected by Strength, Dexterity, Weak, Frail, Vulnerable, and most other powers.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Fragile
keywords.description: This card has a 1 in 3 chance of automatically exhausting when drawn.

keywords.name: Free Draw
keywords.description: If you do not draw this card at the start of combat, add it to your hand.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Gift
keywords.description: This card's primary effects are active while in your hand. A Gift may also have an additional effects with triggers.

keywords.name: Gift Uses
keywords.description: Gift cards Retain while they have uses, and immediately Exhaust when they are out. One use is consumed when a Gift card's primary effect triggers.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Immobile
keywords.description: Block is not removed at the start of your turn, but you may only play Attack cards if they are Ranged.

keywords.name: Invisible Bomb
keywords.description: Causes the target to lose HP each time a Star Blasting Fuse is drawn.

keywords.name: Life Steal
keywords.description: Heal HP when dealing unblocked damage.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Magical
keywords.description: Magical cards are created by spending Norma Levels and gain charges for each Level spent. One Norma is regained each time a Magical card expends a charge.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Memory
keywords.description: A converted Memory is removed from play, but it's effect autoplayed at no cost when other cards of the same type are played. A turn based cooldown relative to it's original cost is then applied.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Norma
keywords.description: Cards may have listed bonus effects at specific Norma levels.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Optimized
keywords.description: This card gives only as much Block as needed, determined by your current block and the intent of your enemies. The remaining amount will be given as Vigor.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Overheat
keywords.description:
Attacks to this target will Pierce.
If this target has no Block, they take 30% more damage from attacks.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Piercing
keywords.description: If this Attack damages the enemy's Block, they lose an equal amount of HP.

keywords.name: Plushie Mark
keywords.description:
If a target is hit for 7 or less damage, raise the damage to 7 and Pierce.
If no Pierce was performed, gain 3 temporary HP.
One mark consumed per hit.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Ranged
keywords.description: Ranged attacks do not trigger Thorns and can be played while Immobile.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Reduced
keywords.description: This card's base values are lowered by 1.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Reset
keywords.description: This card resets its conditional effect when played.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Revenge
keywords.description: This effect is 50% stronger if used on the last enemy who attacked you.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Rival
keywords.description: Attacks against your Rival deal 10% additional damage. Increases by 10% if your Rival attacked you last turn.

keywords.name: Shield Counter
keywords.description:
Any attack you fully block is reflected onto the attacker.
If you still have Block at the end of the turn and rollover is applied, you do not lose Shield Counter.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Special
keywords.description: This card can not be obtained from normal card-drops.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Splash
keywords.description: The primary target takes the full effect. ALL OTHER targets take half the amount.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Steady
keywords.description: Gain more Block the next time a Block gaining card is played.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Stunned
keywords.description: A stunned target does nothing this turn.

keywords.name: Temporal Anchor
keywords.description:
Your Temporal Anchor allows you to rewind your personal state to when it was created. All other entities are unaffected.
A Temporal Anchor will undergo Divergence the longer you take between creating it and rewinding to it.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Transformative
keywords.description: This card Transforms when drawn or retained.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Trap
keywords.description: This card's effect ignores Artifact.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Voiding
keywords.description: Lose 1 energy when you draw this card.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Wanted
keywords.description:
This turn, the Wanted enemy becomes the target of all attacks and negative effects.
The Wanted enemy will not injure itself by default.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Withering
keywords.description: This card immediately exhausts, regardless of where it is.
